titleStmt.title: A brief and plain commentary with notes, not more useful than seasonable, upon the whole prophecie of Malachy delivered, sermon-wise, divers years since at Pitmister in Summerset / by William Sclater ... ; now published by his son William Sclater ...
titleStmt.author: Sclater, William, 1609-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.L. for Christopher Meredith ...,
